GPyVector.h

5 #ifndef GB_PY_VECTOR_H
6 #define GB_PY_VECTOR_H
7 
8 // External
9 #include <pybind11/operators.h>
10 
11 // Internal
12 #include "../GPythonWrapper.h"
13 #include "../../geometry/GVector.h"
14 
15 namespace rev {
17 // Forward Declarations
19 
21 // Class Definitions
23 
25 class PyVector{
26 public:
27 
28  template<typename T, size_t N>
29  static Vector<T, N> Create(const py::object& po) {
30  using VecClass = Vector<T, N>;
31  VecClass vec = VecClass::EmptyVector();
32  PythonAPI::get()->toVec(po, vec);
33  return vec;
34  }
35 
37  template<typename T, size_t N>
38  static void PyInitialize(py::module_& m, const char* className) {
39  using VecClass = Vector<T, N>;
40  auto vecClass = py::class_<VecClass>(m, className)
41  .def(py::init<>())
42  .def(py::init<T, T>())
43  .def(py::init<T, T, T>())
44  .def(py::init<T, T, T, T>())
45  .def(py::init<const VecClass&>())
46  .def(py::init<>(&PyVector::Create<T, N>))
47  .def("lerp", &VecClass::lerp)
48  .def("__str__", [](const VecClass& vec) {return QString(vec).toStdString(); })
49  .def("__repr__", [](const VecClass& vec) {return QString(vec).toStdString(); })
50  .def(py::self + py::self)
51  .def(py::self + T())
52  .def(py::self + int())
53  .def("__add__", [](const VecClass& vec, const py::object& po) {
54  VecClass v2 = VecClass::EmptyVector();
55  PythonAPI::get()->toVec(po, v2);
56  return vec + v2;
57  })
58  .def(py::self += py::self)
59  .def(py::self += T())
60  .def(py::self - py::self)
61  .def("__sub__", [](const VecClass& vec, const py::object& po) {
62  VecClass v2 = VecClass::EmptyVector();
63  PythonAPI::get()->toVec(po, v2);
64  return vec - v2;
65  })
66  .def(-py::self)
67  .def(py::self -= py::self)
68  .def(py::self -= T())
69  .def(py::self * py::self)
70  .def(py::self * T())
71  .def(T() * py::self)
72  .def(py::self * int())
73  .def("__mul__", [](const VecClass& vec, const py::object& po) {
74  if (PythonAPI::get()->isListLike(po.ptr())) {
75  VecClass v2 = VecClass::EmptyVector();
76  PythonAPI::get()->toVec(po, v2);
77  v2 *= vec;
78  return v2;
79  }
80  else {
81  return vec * PythonAPI::get()->cType<T>(po.ptr());
82  }
83  })
84  .def("__getitem__", [](const VecClass &v, size_t i) {
85  if (i >= v.size()) {
86  throw py::index_error();
87  }
88  return v[i];
89  }) // See: https://github.com/pybind/pybind11/blob/master/tests/test_sequences_and_iterators.cpp
90  .def(py::self *= py::self)
91  .def(py::self *= T())
92  .def(py::self == py::self)
93  .def(py::self != py::self)
94  .def("to_list", [](const VecClass& v) { return PythonAPI::get()->toPyTuple(v.asStdVector()); })
95  .def("length", &VecClass::length)
96  .def("length_squared", &VecClass::lengthSquared)
97  .def("normalized", &VecClass::normalized)
98  .def("normalize", &VecClass::normalize)
99  ;
100 
101  // Type-specific specializations
102  if constexpr (N >= 1) {
103  vecClass.def_property("x", &VecClass::x, &VecClass::setX);
104  }
105  if constexpr (N >= 2) {
106  vecClass.def_property("y", &VecClass::y, &VecClass::setY);
107  }
108  if constexpr (N >= 3) {
109  vecClass.def_property("z", &VecClass::z, &VecClass::setZ);
110  }
111  if constexpr (N >= 4) {
112  vecClass.def_property("w", &VecClass::w, &VecClass::setW);
113  }
114 
115  if constexpr (N == 3) {
116  vecClass.def_static("left", VecClass::Left);
117  vecClass.def_static("right", VecClass::Right);
118  vecClass.def_static("up", VecClass::Up);
119  vecClass.def_static("down", VecClass::Down);
120  vecClass.def_static("forward", VecClass::Forward);
121  vecClass.def_static("back", VecClass::Back);
122 
123  vecClass.def("cross", &VecClass::cross);
124  vecClass.def("dot", &VecClass::dot);
125  }
126  }
127 
128 };
129 
131 } // End namespaces
132 
133 #endif
rev::PyVector::PyInitialize
static void PyInitialize(py::module_ &m, const char *className)
Wrap a behavior for Python.

rev::PyVector
